content: What famous painting by Grant Wood depicts a farmer holding a pitchfork standing next to a woman in front of a house with a Gothic window?

The famous painting you're referring to is "American Gothic" by Grant Wood. It features a farmer holding a pitchfork standing next to a woman in front of a house with a Gothic window. The painting is one of the most recognizable images in 20th-century American art and has been the subject of numerous parodies and cultural references.
